page.title: 02FARMING-BROOMFOLD FARM
page.content: The name of our farm is{Broomfold {Farm}and the address of our house is {"SANDFORD",}Star of Markinch. The farm is at the west end of Star. On the farm there are my parents James and Sandra, my brothers Craig and Andrew and myself Ian. My dad's age is 38, my mum is 32, Craig is 6 and Andrew is 3. I am 9. My dad works on the farm and my Grandpa is the Manager. On the farm we have 4 workers, they are Harry, Minnie, William who is my Grandpa and there is my dad. We have an arable and pasture farm. We grow{turnips,} {potatoes, hay and barley.}We give the hay to the cows in winter. We use the straw for bedding the cows in the wint er. We send our potatoes to{Methil.} We send our grain to be made into beer and flour. We send some grain to {Plunkie Farm}for their pigs.
